name: Hollow Blades
text: All melee and natural attacks from the target deal damage as if the target were one size category smaller than it actually is. While the target is under the effects of this spell, weapons dropped by the target function normally for other creatures, while any melee weapons picked up by the target deal damage as if one size smaller. Ranged attacks and weapons are unaffected by this spell.
text_zh: 目标的所有近战与天生武器攻击所造成的伤害，视为它实际体型小一阶。当目标处于此法术效果时，由目标所丢落的武器对其他生物来说如常运作，而任何目标拿起来的近战武器，在用来造成伤害时，也视为它体型小一阶。远程攻击与其武器不受此法术的影响。
